testimonials.text: I have worked with Tiril in her role as sell-through representative (STR) for Bose.  In her role as STR, Tiril conducted trainings in stores and at events, made sure the stores were representative of Bose's brand, and followed up locally when needed. Tiril is positive, always willing to help and a doer. She has great knowledge about the products, the brand and how to approach store staff.   I can recommend Tiril for any work related to sales, store responsibility, trainings and working in teams.

I worked with Tiril Fjell for about a year in her role as Sell Through Representative, in Oslo. Tiril is a quick learner who implements the company culture down to the smallest detail and really know how to be a team player. During our one-year work relationship, Tiril has received an extensive amount of assignments from me, all completed to the fullest. Tiril has a great sense of responsibility and communication skill on a high-level. As her former manager, I would not hesitate to have Tiril on my team again.
